meta.title: Modern Landing Page Template - NextLanding
meta.description: A beautiful, modern landing page template built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Perfect for startups and SaaS products.

hero.title: Build Something
hero.subtitle: The modern landing page template that helps you ship faster. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: A comprehensive template with all the modern tools and best practices to help you launch your project quickly and efficiently.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Optimized for performance with Next.js App Router and static generation.

secure.title: Secure by Default
secure.description: Built with security best practices and modern authentication patterns.

beautiful.title: Beautiful Design
beautiful.description: Carefully crafted with Tailwind CSS and a cohesive design system.

developer.title: Developer Friendly
developer.description: TypeScript support, ESLint configuration, and excellent DX out of the box.

seo.title: SEO Optimized
seo.description: Meta tags, structured data, and performance optimizations included.

mobile.title: Mobile First
mobile.description: Responsive design that works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes.

features.badge: Ready to deploy on Vercel in one click

cta.title: Ready to build your
cta.subtitle: Get started with our modern landing page template. Clone, customize, and deploy in minutes, not hours.

footer.description: The modern landing page template that helps you build and deploy beautiful websites faster than ever before.
